name: JavaObjectTransformerTest
description: Tests for the JavaObjectTransformer class, focusing on transforming and validating Java objects and records.

nested_classes.name: Person
nested_classes.description: A nested class representing a person with various attributes.

nested_classes.name: Client
nested_classes.description: A nested record representing a client with various attributes.

test_cases.name: javaObjectTest
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a Java object (Person) using the JavaObjectTransformer.

test_cases.name: javaRecordTest
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a Java record (Client) using the JavaObjectTransformer.

test_cases.name: javaStreamingTest
test_cases.description: Tests the streaming generation of Java objects (Person) using the JavaObjectTransformer.

test_cases.name: javaEmptyStreamTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of an empty stream of Java objects using the JavaObjectTransformer.

test_cases.name: javaCollectionTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a collection of Java objects (Person) using the JavaObjectTransformer.
